subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Sarah Hendrickson, the reigning world champion in the women’s ski jump, is coming off an injury, raising questions about how strong she will be at the Sochi Olympics.
snippet: Sarah Hendrickson, the reigning world champion in the women’s ski jump, is coming off an injury, raising questions about how strong she will be at the Sochi Olympics.
